title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Embodied Collaborative Learning Design Through Clinical Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental medical terminology and understanding of team-based activities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can execute clinical problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy through verbal and non-verbal collaboration in a simulation environment.
Learners can analyze the correlation between team-specific spatial behavior patterns and verbal interactions to derive at least three efficient collaboration methods.
Learners can visualize and interpret behavioral data at each learning stage using MMLA (Multimodal Learning Analytics) tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
